import React, { useState, useEffect }from 'react'; import './Chat.css'; import axios from 'axios'; const urluser = "http://localhost:3001/api/user" const Chat = (props) => { const [user, setUser] = useState([]); const searchUser = async () => { await axios.get(urluser) .then(res => { const user = res.data; setUser({user}) }) user.user.user.map(user => console.log(user.singupDate)) } const number = 1; const avatar = `https://bootdey.com/img/Content/avatar/avatar${number}.png` const description = [ 'Hey, have you finished up with the Ladybug project?', "Cool. I'll see you guys then.", "Kevin, tomorrow is GoT night at my house. Bring your HDMI extension. Thanks.", "Sales want to see you. Something about the new product.", "Meeting next week Tuesday. Nothing serious, just bring teams work progress with you.", "hey, what does this error mean?", ] useEffect(() => { searchUser(); }, []) return (
New Chat

); } export default Chat;
